original_text: If she does not please the master who has selected her for himself, he must let her be redeemed. He has no right to sell her to foreigners, because he has broken faith with her.
korean_text: 만일 상전이 그를 기뻐하지 아니하여 상관하지 아니하면 그를 속량하게 할 것이나 상전이 그 여자를 속인 것이 되었으니 외국인에게는 팔지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If she does not please the master
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그녀가 주인을 기쁘게 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: who has selected her for himself
he must let her be redeemed
He has no right to sell her to foreigners
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀를 외국인에게 판 권리가 없다

sentences.original_text: because he has broken faith with her
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 그녀와의 신의를 깼기 때문이다
